title: 6. Revocation of Veterinary Surgeons (Qualifying Degrees) Order 1954
heading: PRESCRIBED EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS-VETERINARY
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 2 

PRESCRIBED EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS-VETERINARY 
NURSE 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [280] 3 

S.I. No. 280 of 2022 

VETERINARY COUNCIL OF IRELAND (PRESCRIPTION OF 
EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS) REGULATIONS 2022 

The Veterinary Council of Ireland, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by 
section 65 and section 133 of the Veterinary Practice Act 2005 (No. 22 of 
2005), hereby makes the following regulations:- 

Citation
text_norm: schedule 2 prescribed educational qualifications-veterinary nurse 280 3 s.i no 280 2022 veterinary council ireland (prescription educational qualifications) regulation 2022 veterinary council ireland exercise power conferred section 65 section 133 veterinary practice act 2005 (no 22 2005) hereby make following regulation - citation

title: 6. Revocation of Veterinary Surgeons (Qualifying Degrees) Order 1954
heading: 4. The qualifications specified in Schedule 1 to these Regulations are
text_raw:
4. The qualifications specified in Schedule 1 to these Regulations are 
prescribed by the Council pursuant to section 65 of the Act as the 
qualifications required to be obtained for registration as a veterinary 
practitioner pursuant to section 42 of the Act. 

Prescription of educational qualifications for registration as a veterinary 
nurse

title: 6. Revocation of Veterinary Surgeons (Qualifying Degrees) Order 1954
heading: 5. The qualifications specified in Schedule 1 to these Regulations are
text_raw:
5. The qualifications specified in Schedule 1 to these Regulations are 
prescribed by the Council pursuant to section 65 of the Act as the qualifications 
required to be obtained for registration as a veterinary nurse pursuant to section 
95 of the Act. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th June, 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [280] 

Revocations

title: 6. Revocation of Veterinary Surgeons (Qualifying Degrees) Order 1954
heading: 6. The Veterinary Surgeons (Qualifying Degrees) Order 1954 (S.I. No. 85
text_raw:
6. The Veterinary Surgeons (Qualifying Degrees) Order 1954 (S.I. No. 85 

of 1954) is hereby revoked. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Veterinary Council 

of Ireland, 

9 June, 2022. 

VIVIENNE DUGGAN, 

President. 

NIAMH MULDOON, 

Registrar. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [280] 5
text_norm: 6 veterinary surgeon (qualifying degrees) order 1954 (s.i no 85 1954) hereby revoked given official seal veterinary council ireland 9 june 2022 vivienne duggan president niamh muldoon registrar 280 5

title: 6. Revocation of Veterinary Surgeons (Qualifying Degrees) Order 1954
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations set out the qualifications prescribed by the Council pursuant 
to section 65 of the Act as the qualifications required to be obtained for 
registration a veterinary practitioner pursuant to section 42 of the Act. These 
Regulations also set out the qualifications prescribed by the Council pursuant 
to section 65 of the Act as the qualifications required to be obtained for 
registration as a veterinary nurse pursuant to section 95 of the Act. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Veterinary Council of Ireland 
(prescription of educational qualifications) Regulations 2022. 

These Regulations come into operation on the 1st July 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8 [280]
